pkgmetadata.longdescription: Basu-Dhar Bivariate Geometric Distribution // Computes the joint probability mass function, the joint cumulative distribution, the correlation coefficient and generate random deviates from the Basu-Dhar bivariate geometric distribution. The package also computes the joint survival function in presence of cure fraction using the mixture model approach (For more details, see Achcar et. al (2016) doi:10.1080/02664763.2015.1117589 and de Oliveira et. al (2018) doi:10.1080/02664763.2018.1495701).
